availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: James Madison Crow (Caldwell County, Kentucky, farmer)

body.p: Caldwell County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Mary M. Kilgore Crow in Caldwell County, Kentucky, on March 11, 1845. Father of John N. Crow, William M. Crow, James H. Crow, Helen Crow, Ann Crow, and Lucy Crow. Married to Amanda Crow. Father of E. M. Crow and R. W. Crow. Farmer in Caldwell County in 1850. Farmer in Caldwell County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Caldwell County, District 2, p. 397A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Caldwell County, Princeton, p. 39.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Caldwell County, Princeton, p. 466A-B.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Caldwell County Marriages, Film #000851644.
Kentucky Death Certificates, 1911-1965, Kentucky Office of Vital Statistics, KDLA, Frankfort, KY, File #11622.
